column5: Custom built 1600 sq ft beach house. It is about 400 ft to the beach. This spacious home has a comfortable open living, dining, kitchen area for all of your guest to gather and enjoy. Kitchen has everything you need to prepare and serve meals. The master bedroom has a queen size bed and an ensuite bathroom. The second bedroom is large and furnished with 2 full size beds. The third room may be everyones favorite with it's custom full size bunk beds, each with a light and charging station.
